import*as ActionTypes from'./ActionTypes';export var fetchMenu=function fetchMenu(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(menuLoading(true));return fetch('http://davids-restaurant.herokuapp.com/categories.json').then(function(res){if(res.ok){return res;}else{var error=new Error('Error '+res.status+': '+res.statusText);error.res=res;throw error;}},function(error){var errMsg=new Error(error.message);throw errMsg;}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(menu){return dispatch(addMenu(menu));}).catch(function(error){return dispatch(menuFailed(error.message));});};};export var menuLoading=function menuLoading(){return{type:ActionTypes.MENU_LOADING};};export var menuFailed=function menuFailed(errMsg){return{type:ActionTypes.MENU_FAILED,payload:errMsg};};// add Menus
export var addMenu=function addMenu(menu){return{type:ActionTypes.ADD_MENU,payload:menu};};
